3. Chronic rejection - This refers to a gradual and persistent reaction to a foreign substance, often involving the immune system.
4. Interstitial fibrosis - This refers to the accumulation of scar tissue in the interstitial space between cells.
5. Tubular atrophy - This refers to the degeneration or shrinkage of tubular structures in the kidney.
6. Glomerulopathy - This refers to a disease of the glomeruli, the tiny blood vessels in the kidney that filter waste and excess fluids from the blood.
